attacks.name: Spiral Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Holy Star
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Rayquaza Star. This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon-ex. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
